00025 #ifndef _PHYSICS_SIMPLECOLLISIONCULLER_
00026 #define _PHYSICS_SIMPLECOLLISIONCULLER_
00027 
00028 #include <physics/physics>
00029 
00030 #include <physics/CollisionCuller>
00031 #include <physics/CollidableBody>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace physics {
00035 
00036 /// Simple Collider that only culls Collidable pairs that have been disabled
00037 ///  (also flattens a heirarchy of Collidable/CollidableGroups into a flat
00038 ///  set of CollidableBodys)
00039 /// i.e. listeners will only be called with CollidableBodys, no CollidableGroups will be passed
00040 ///   through - instead all combinations of pairs of CollidableBodys from any group will be
00041 ///   passed. This is useful to pass to a CollisionDetector, which only accepts CollidableBodys.
00042 class SimpleCollisionCuller : public CollisionCuller
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   SimpleCollisionCuller() {}
00046   virtual ~SimpleCollisionCuller() {}
00047   
00048   virtual String className() const { return String("SimpleCollisionCuller"); }
00049 
00050   virtual ref<CollidableGroup> createCollidableGroup() const
00051   { return ref<CollidableGroup>(NewObj CollidableGroup()); }
00052 
00053   virtual void collide(ref<const Collidable> collidable1, ref<const Collidable> collidable2);
00054   virtual void collide(ref<const Collidable> collidable) { Collider::collide(collidable); }
00055   
00056 protected:
00057   SimpleCollisionCuller(const SimpleCollisionCuller& cc) : CollisionCuller(cc) {}
00058   
00059 };
00060 
00061 
00062 } // physics
00063 
00064 #endif
Generated on Thu Jul 29 15:56:29 2004 for OpenSim by 1.3.6
